Name: Fruits of the Forest
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
SHAKE the first 5 ingredients with ice.
Carefully POUR black raspberry liqueur into the centre of the cocktail: it should sink to the bottom.
Review: Grassy, floral, citrus and smooth, but look out for the fruity bottom.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2004 by Stuart Barnett at TGI Fridays in Reading, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Fruits of the Forest contains 225 calories
